+++Описание
Енум состояний контейнера.
+++Атрибуты

+++Перечень значений
* 0 - [MEngineState_Unknown]   - Unknown state
* 1 - [MEngineState_Open]      - Engine is opened and ready to work
* 2 - [MEngineState_Closed]    - Engine is inactive
* 3 - [MEngineState_Broken]    - Engine is brocken
* 4 - [MEngineState_Executing] - Engine executes some operations. Wait for Open state.
